means: 骄奢淫逸的人，酒色之徒

sentence.Network_cn: 将骄奢淫逸的人引到艰苦的生活中来,这条路是漫长的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin volupt(u)arius, from voluptas 'pleasure'

means.word_mean: 1. a person addicted to luxury and pleasures of the senses

sentences.sentence: "enjoyed a luxurious suite with a crystal chandelier and thick oriental rugs"
"Lucullus spent the remainder of his days in voluptuous magnificence"

auth_sentence.content: Odets saw his voluptuary itch as a legacy from his mother.
auth_sentence.res_content: Odets saw his voluptuary itch as a legacy from his mother.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Odets saw his voluptuary itch as a legacy from his mother.

auth_sentence.content: We do not expect a voluptuary to seek his pleasure in domesticity.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: We do not expect a voluptuary to seek his pleasure in domesticity.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……的"; 2. 表名词,"人,场所,物等"

document文档+ary……的;表"物"→文件的[形容词];记录片[名词]
